title: Weak acid titration curve - pKa and NaOH molarity

content.question: Data collected during the titration of a 20.0 mL sample of a 0.10 M solution of a monoprotic acid with a solution of NaOH of unknown concentration are plotted in the graph above. Based on the data, which of the following are the approximate pKa of the acid and the molar concentration of the NaOH?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
